headline: APPAREL DEVELOPMENT
paragraph1: Sample overview, Quality control, Ironing & Packaging
paragraph2: After we create the sample, we send it back to the client to test the fit, fabrics making sure the garment fully meet the expected outcome. Throughout the process, our team are also available for short virtual meetings to check details and fit to not lose any time on both sides.
paragraph3: Immediately after the production is completed, our quality control team reviews every stitch and neatly steams the garment, folds it and wraps into poly bags, which are being packed into boxes.
